name: Low-fat Brownies
description: This guilt-free, low-fat dessert has only 140 calories per serving! Cut into small bites for delicate nibbling.
preparation: Lightly spray an 8" x 8" pan with vegetable oil.
Sift cocoa powder, flour, baking powder and salt into a medium mixing bowl.
In large bowl, whisk together sugar, butter, egg whites, applesauce and vanilla extract.
Stir flour mixture into wet ingredients until just combined.
Pour into prepared pan and bake 35–40 minutes (for chewy brownies, do not overbake). Cool in pan and cut into squares.
tips: Using a stainless steel strainer or dredger, sift icing sugar or cocoa powder overtop for a decorative touch.
